item.title: Proxmox
item.description: Increase disk size in the GUI or with the following command Resize Disk Increase disk sizeIncrease disk size in the GUI or with the following command 1 qm resize 100 virtio0 +5G Decrease disk size Before decreasing disk sizes in Proxmox, you should take a backup! Convert qcow2 to raw 1 qemu-img convert vm-100.qcow2 vm-100.raw Shrink the disk 1 qemu-img resize -f raw vm-100.raw 10G Convert back to qcow2# 1 qemu-img convert -p -O qcow2 vm-100.
